content.data: Sidebar
There are three Primary Areas in the S2M for ALPHACAM sidebar:
image575.png
Toolbar
There are 8 options in the toolbar:
image576.png

Open a New PNC File - Allows you to open a previously exported PNC file. This will overwrite the currently open Job. 
 
 
  Import a PNC File into Current Job - Allows you to add the contents of a previously exported PNC file into the current Job. 
 
 
  Save Current Job as a PNC File - Allows you to Save the current Job as a PNC file for later use. 
 
 
  Print - Allows printing of the Parts List. 
 
 
   Edit Part Library  - Allows you to manage your S2M CENTER Part Library. 
 
 
  Show Par/Material List - Allows you to toggle on/off the Part List/Material List. 
 
 
   Materials List  - Displays the Material List for the Current Job. 
 
 
   Parts List  - Displays the Part List for the Current Job.

Optimizer Parameters  - Same as in the Standard S2M CENTER.

Machines
